job_title: Assistant / Graduate Engineer, Land Supply / Municipal
description:
About AECOM

AECOM is the world’s premier infrastructure consulting firm, delivering professional services throughout the project lifecycle – from planning, design and engineering to program and construction management. On projects spanning transportation, buildings, water, energy and the environment, our public- and private-sector clients trust us to solve their most complex challenges. Our teams are driven by a common purpose to deliver a better world through our unrivalled technical expertise and innovation, a culture of equity, diversity and inclusion, and a commitment to environmental, social and governance priorities. AECOM is a Fortune 500 firm and its Professional Services business had revenue of $13.2 billion in fiscal year 2020. See how we deliver what others can only imagine at aecom.com and @AECOM.

Responsibilities

· Assist the Project Manager / Senior-in-charge on all aspect of civil engineering design works

· Provide technical inputs for civil engineering design and consulting assignments

· Provide accurate and professionally responsible outputs on program and on budget

· Coordinate between project team members, clients, government agencies, design institutes, and other stakeholders to facilitate project implementation

· Assist in technical proposal preparation, prepare tender documents and tendering assistance

· Conduct project research program if required

· Enforce ethics and compliance policy including Third Party payment, Sub-consultancy engagement process and Gift and Entertainment policy

Requirements

· Bachelor degree or above in Civil Engineering / Transportation Planning / Logistics or related engineering disciplines. Graduates with 1-4+ years' experience may be considered for Assistant Engineer position with strong interest in transportation

· Effective individual contributor with ability to work well in team

· Good interpersonal, analytical and problem-solving skills

· Able to meet various deadlines to complete tasks and project works assigned

· Self-motivated with high personal drive for achievements and success

· Knowledgeable in IT tools including business and engineering software and applications

· Good command in written & spoken English while Chinese language skills may be preferred

AECOM is a place where you can put your innovative thinking and business skills into high gear and work alongside other highly intelligent and motivated people. It's a place where you can apply your skills to some of the world's most challenging, interesting, and meaningful projects worldwide. It's a place that values the diversity of our areas of practice and our people. It's what makes AECOM a great place to work and grow.

AECOM is an Equal Opportunity Employer. For more information on AECOM, please visit our website at www.aecom.com.

工作目標

協助樂餉社食食品銀行的日常運作，以確保食品公司向當地慈善機構有效捐贈食品；
支援倉庫及物流工作，並確保所有食物捐贈都能安全且專業的處理。

工作範圍

確保所有食物捐贈能妥善收集，檢查，接收，儲存和分發；
協助駕駛團隊收集及派發食物捐贈等物流事宜及運送車的裝載及卸貨；
協助營運團隊點收貨物、執貨、搬貨、包裝、盤點、整理倉庫裝等倉務工作；
負責倉存資料輸入、貨品出入記錄、行車記錄、確認每日出入貨安排；
保持貨倉及車輛整潔及安全；
遵守交通規則、駕駛汽車安全指引和樂餉社的政策和規則；
義工協助出車時，必須確保他們的安全，及一個愉快的義工經驗；
處理部門主管要求的其他職務。

職位要求

中三教育程度或以上或同等相關經驗；
持有有效的私家車及輕型貨車（車輛類別1, 2）駕駛執照；
良好駕駛記錄；
最少三年駕駛經驗；
能接受靈活的工作時間，工作時間會因應運營安排而有所變動；
具備倉庫或物流經驗；
懂使用唧車；
能獨立工作，積極主動，勤奮且具備彈性正面的工作態度；
懂基本電腦操作。

待遇

5天工作 ；
09:00 - 18:00，1小時午膳時間 ；
星期六日休假 ；
銀行假期；
醫療保險 ；
持有有效的中型貨車（車輛類別18）駕駛執照月薪達$17,000。

工作類型: 全職, 長期

薪酬： 每月 $14,000-17,000
